content.rendered:
VENUE DIRECTOR

Cherokee Dock

Annika was born and raised in Springfield, Tenn., attending a local community college to study health science. She has 18 years of experience in various facets of hospitality throughout her life, giving her a strong background in the industry.  

Before starting with Infinity Hospitality, she was a personal assistant, which is where she found her love of managing daily activities, scheduling appointments, organizing dinners, and traveling. She loves to coordinate day-to-day activities while ensuring that everything is perfect right down to the smallest details. Because of this, guests of Infinity can expect to relax, unwind, and have the best experience possible without having to worry about their schedule. 

Annika is married and has two amazing fur babies, Chef and Izzy. She loves to travel and explore new cultures. When she is not working, you will find her at the dog park, yoga class, and hanging out with her niece and nephews.
